# Smoked Salmon Rolls

## Ingredients

* [ ] smoked salmon
* [ ] avocado
* [ ] carrot
* [ ] cucumber
* [ ] wasabi

## Recipe

* Sliced all ingredients into long strips then roll

## Notes

* Can mix rice vinegar or lemon juice to help prevent the avocado from browning
